doc.title: Working the Rocker, Called a Jigger, on Poverty Bar, Fourteen Below Discovery Bonanza Creek
doc.plot: The men are seen working a jigger rocker. These men took the jigger from California to the Klondike. They are working on a bar of Bonanza Creek and earning $20 to the man per day. This is a primitive method of mining, the gold passing through holes in a piece of sheet iron and being caught in a blanket placed underneath.
